channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Vegetation actually growing in split road seam, 3rd February
item.description:
Broom avenue the whole length of the road has potholes and seams that need resealing ( or in some cases weeding and resealing !) Please . Thankyou x

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Broom Avenue, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Drivers ignoring no entry signs, 3rd February
item.description:
The junction of Oldhill Street and Stamford Grove East is no entry to Oldhill Street yet drivers continue to flout this and drive the wrong way down the street. The cctv has been vandalised and left unfixed for months. Very dangerous
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oldhill Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose stones in the gutter of Stamford Drive., 3rd February
item.description:
Damage to the gutter at the side of the road in Stamford Drive has caused numerous stones to come loose. These are spread all over the road when the road is cleaned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stamford Drive, Shortlands, Greater London
